p: Melanoma cell line, B16F10, maintained at 37 °C in a humidified atmosphere (90%) containing 5% CO 2. Cells were cultured in RPMI-1640 (Bioidea, Iran) with 10% (v/v) FBS, 100 IU/mL penicillin, and 100 μg/mL streptomycin. The stock solution of the P. atlantica subsp. mutica was prepared at 50 μg/mL in DMSO and kept at -40 °C. Kojic acid (2 and 4 mM) was used as positive control in all experiments. Cells were cultured in 96-well plates in a density of 10 5 cells/mL. The activity of the extract in each experiment was calculated using the following equation:
